help.secretValueBehaviour:
Decide how secret value should behave during device communication.
None - Device secret value will not be generated or renewed
Auto-generate - Device secret value will be generated when missing
Auto-renew - Device secret value will be renewed after specified number of days
Auto-generate and auto-renew - Device secret value will be generated when missing and renewed after specified number of days
